lead_paragraph: Manchester City's Kevin de Bruyne says inconsistency has been their major problem this season and hopes his return from injury will give them a boost in the Premier League run-in and their Champions League quarter-final against Paris St Germain.

headline.print_headline: Man City Must Be More Consistent, Says De Bruyne
headline.main: Man City Must Be More Consistent, Says De Bruyne

snippet: Manchester City's Kevin de Bruyne says inconsistency has been their major problem this season and hopes his return from injury will give them a boost in the Premier League run-in and their Champions League quarter-final against Paris St Germain....
